methods.satisfied:
Is this ancestor satisfied? Note that this method must be safe to call on any thread.

:param step: (long) - The step for which we are testing satisfaction
:return: (boolean) Whether the dependency is satisfied on step (and will not fire subsequent notifications)

text:
A merged listener has a collection of ListenerRecorders. Each one must complete before the merged listener
 fires its sole notification for the cycle.

 You must use a MergedListener if your result table has multiple sources, otherwise it is possible for a table to
 produce notifications more than once in a cycle; which is an error.
